CustomObjectDetection.Name: Custom Object Detection
CustomObjectDetection.Description: The object detection module uses YOLO (You Only Look Once) to locate and classify the objects that the custom models have been trained on.

RouteMaps.Name: Custom Object Detector
RouteMaps.Description: Detects objects based on a custom model. Models are stored as .pt files in /CustomDetection/assets directory, and to make a call to a specific model use /vision/custom/model-name, where 'model-name' is the name of the model's .pt file

Inputs.Name: image
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (image) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for an object will be detected. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: predictions
Outputs.Description: An array of objects with the x_max, x_min, max, y_min, label and confidence.

RouteMaps.Name: Custom Object Detector List Models
RouteMaps.Description: Returns a list of models available.

Outputs.Name: models
Outputs.Description: An array of strings containing the names of the models installed.
